ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We would like to acknowledge the input of Mrs Tiffaney Marlow, pelvic floor physiotherapist of Bluewater Pelvic Health Centre in Ontario, Canada.

sec.title: Authors’ roles
sec.p: All authors meet justification criteria of authorship as per ICMJE that is they all provided substantial contributions to conception and design, or acquisition of data, or analysis and interpretation of data, were involved in drafting the article or revising it critically for important intellectual content, gave final approval of the version to be published and agreed to be accountable for all aspects of the work in ensuring that questions related to the accuracy or integrity of any part of the work are appropriately investigated and resolved.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: No external funding was either sought of obtained for this study.

sec.title: Conflict of interest
sec.p: Dr M.L. reports grants from Australian Women and Children’s Research Foundation, outside the submitted work. Prof. A.W.H. reports grants from Chief Scientist Office, grants from NIHR EME, grants from MRC, grants from Wellbeing of Women, grants from Ferring, other from Roche Diagnostics, during the conduct of the study; other from Honoraria for consultancy for Ferring, Roche and AbbVie, outside the submitted work. Prof. K.V. reports grants from IMI2, NIHR Bayer Healthcare outside the submitted work; other from Bayer Healthcare, Grunenthal GmbH, Eli Lilly and AbbVie outside the submitted work. Mr J.S. reports other from BioCeuticals, personal fees from Australian Medicinal Cannabis Research and Education Collaboration (AMCREC), grants from BioCeuticals/Blackmores, other from United in Compassion, outside the submitted work. Prof. G.C. reports personal fees from Roche, personal fees from GE Healthcare, grants from Australian Women and Children’s Research Foundation, outside the submitted work. Prof. N.P.J. reports personal fees from Guerbet, personal fees from Vifor Pharma, grants and personal fees from Myovant Sciences, grants from AbbVie, personal fees from Roche, outside the submitted work. Dr M.A. reports grants from Metagenics and Spectrum outside the submitted work. Other authors report nothing to disclose.
